Edges-Professional -- Female Veteran Adventurer
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Guts: May reroll Vigor vs. fear
Heavy Sleeper: -4 Vigor (stay awake)
Skills (18 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d8 Survival: (sma) d8+2
Gambling: (sma) d6 Riding: (agi) d6
Intimidation: (spi) d6 Science: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Woodsman: +2 Survival/+2 Stealth (wilds)
All Thumbs: -2 using mechanical and electrical devices, critical failure breaks device
Born In The Saddle: May reroll Riding/Mount gains +2 Pace and +1 Run step
Card Sharp: May reroll Gambling
Heavy Sleeper: -4 Notice (wake up)
Scout: Rolls Notice-2 to detect encounters/Always alert when rolling Notice vs. Stealth/Ignores 2 penalty points for Survival (tracking)/+2 Common Knowledge (known route)
Tale-Teller: +2 Persuasion or Performance to lower fear; Raise gives Conviction
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 10; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (6 points): Born In The Saddle; Card Sharp; Guts; Scout; Tale-Teller; Woodsman Hindrances: All Thumbs; Big Mouth; Heavy Sleeper; Stubborn Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 6 (1) Cover: 1 Toughness: 5 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
